entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
